name: Google Drive Dark Mode
description: Since Google hasn't yet included a dark theme for Drive, I decided to make my own and share it with the community. Please let me know if there are any bugs or feature requests, and I will address them to the best of my ability.
additional_info:
v2.1 - Dark mode for search tools and context menus.

v2.0 - Code structure has been simplified for editing purposes. Updates will roll out frequently to add dark style to more parts of the website.

v1.0 - Initial release
